subject: Vam rumble compatible with SIM hub?
description_text:
Hello
I recently purchased your VAM rumble reactors (non-pro) and proceeded to
install it including the software. In your advertisement on Amazon and your
official website seems to indicate that it and the software is supposed to
be compatible with SIM hud. Attached below is the image in reference


Now my question is basically how do I get it to work with SIM hub? I have
gotten it to work directly with iRacing but that does not leave me my
preferred customisability.

Thank you for your time
?

conversations.body_text: Hi David Bautista,  Which pedal model are you using? Our pedals are supported on SimHub version 9.9.3 and above, and they are compatible with iRacing. Please connect the power first, test the vibration in Simsonn Manager 2.1.0, and once it works properly, add our device in SimHub and run a test.Â
